item.title: EP 49 - Crazy Cryptid Week: The Jba Fofi and The Sabinche Tomatovic Tape
item.itunes:title: Crazy Cryptid Week: The Jba Fofi and The Sabinche Tomatovic Tape
item.description:
Today we look at the biggest loser of the serial killer world and examine a porn tape starring a woman and a giant spider.

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

John "Eric" Armstrong is a serial killer who claims to have killed over a dozen women. But no one believes him. In the world of serial killers he gets no respect, no respect I tell ya. Let's look at this (un)lovable loser and laugh!

Then we travel back to Africa to meet the Jba Fofi. The Jba Fofi is supposedly a giant spider that hunts beast and man alike. But there's an even darker rumor: that this spider also once starred in a porno. Move over, Ron Jeremy! You thought 8 inches was impressive, wait till you see eight legs!

John "Eric" Armstrong

http://murderpedia.org/male.A/a/armstrong-john.htm

Ex-Sailor Linked To Slayings Of Prostitutes World Wide

https://www.nytimes.com/2000/04/14/us/ex-sailor-linked-to-slayings-of-prostitutes-worldwide.html

The Jba Fofi

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jba_fofi

Jba Fofi

http://monstersvault.com/concept_arts/jba-fofi-congolese-giant-spider-cryptid/

Does The Jba Fofi Exist?

https://tocontriveandjive.wordpress.com/2016/12/18/does-the-jba-fofi-exist/

The Coconut Crab

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coconut_crab

Sabinche Tomatovic Tape Post

https://archive.4plebs.org/x/thread/20077595/

The Giant Spider Of France

https://aadl.org/node/123594

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
Hood River

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
